title: Buying Notebooks and Stationery
desc: Assist customers in selecting notebooks and other stationery items based on their preferences such as notebook type, page style, size, and additional items like pens and markers.
prompt_en: You want to buy notebooks and stationery. What type of notebooks do you prefer? Composition or spiral? Do you want lined or blank pages? What size do you need? Would you like to add pens, pencils, or other stationery items?
prompt_zh: 您想購買筆記本和文具。您喜歡哪種類型的筆記本？是作文本還是螺旋裝訂？您需要有線條還是空白頁？您需要什麼尺寸？您還想加購原子筆、鉛筆或其他文具嗎？
sample_questions: Do you have composition notebooks with lined pages?
How much are the blue gel ballpoint pens?
Can I get a pack of washable markers?
What sizes of notebooks do you have?
Are the notebook covers plastic or paper?

title: Gift Recommendations for Wife and Daughter
desc: Help customers find suitable birthday gifts such as necklaces for wives and accessories for children, considering style preferences and budget.
prompt_en: Looking for a birthday present? Would you like recommendations for jewelry like necklaces? Do you prefer simple or sophisticated designs? Also, do you want gift ideas for children like headbands or toys?
prompt_zh: 在尋找生日禮物嗎？您需要珠寶如項鍊的推薦嗎？您喜歡簡單還是複雜的設計？另外，您是否需要兒童禮物的建議，例如髮帶或玩具？
sample_questions: Can you show me simple necklace designs?
What is the price of the gold necklace with the circular pendant?
Do you have any discounts on jewelry today?
What gifts do you recommend for a seven-year-old girl?
Is the silver heart necklace available?

title: Trying on Clothes and Size Assistance
desc: Assist customers in trying on clothes, finding the right size, and matching outfits for occasions such as parties, including advice on current fashion trends.
prompt_en: Would you like to try on this blouse? Do you need a different size? Are you looking for outfit suggestions for a party? What styles or trends do you prefer?
prompt_zh: 您想試穿這件襯衫嗎？您需要其他尺寸嗎？您在尋找派對的穿搭建議嗎？您喜歡什麼樣的風格或流行趨勢？
sample_questions: Do you have this blouse in extra small?
What do you think about pairing this skirt with a crop top?
Is this outfit suitable for a casual house party?
Can you recommend trendy clothes for summer?
How much is this blouse?

title: Buying Running Shoes on Sale
desc: Help customers select comfortable running shoes, provide information about discounts, sizes available, and allow trying shoes before purchase.
prompt_en: Are you looking for running shoes? Would you like to try on our sneakers? We have a 50% discount today. What size do you need?
prompt_zh: 您在找跑步鞋嗎？您想試穿我們的運動鞋嗎？今天有五折優惠。您需要什麼尺寸？
sample_questions: Which shoes are best for running?
Do you have size eight sneakers?
How much are the sneakers after discount?
Can I walk around the store with the shoes on?
Are these shoes comfortable for long runs?

title: Lost Glasses Assistance
desc: Assist customers in reporting and searching for lost glasses by collecting detailed descriptions and contact information for follow-up.
prompt_en: Have you lost your glasses? Can you describe their shape, frame color, and where you last saw them? Please provide your phone number for contact if found.
prompt_zh: 您遺失眼鏡了嗎？請描述眼鏡的形狀、鏡框顏色以及最後看到它們的位置。請提供您的電話號碼以便找到時聯絡您。
sample_questions: What do your lost glasses look like?
Were they left at the sunglasses counter?
Are the frames thick or thin?
Can I leave my contact number for updates?
Have any glasses been turned in recently?

title: Buying a Family SUV
desc: Help customers choose a suitable SUV with features like leather interior, backup camera, third-row seating, and good gas mileage, and arrange test drives and financing.
prompt_en: Are you interested in an SUV with good gas mileage and family features? Would you like to test drive our hybrid SUV? We also offer financing options.
prompt_zh: 您有興趣購買油耗良好且適合家庭使用的SUV嗎？您想試駕我們的混合動力SUV嗎？我們也提供分期付款方案。
sample_questions: Does this SUV have third-row seating?
What is the gas mileage of this car?
How much does the hybrid SUV cost?
Can I schedule a test drive?
What financing deals are available?

title: Car Noise Diagnosis and Repair
desc: Diagnose car noises such as squeaking, recommend repairs like brake pad replacement, oil change, and spark plug replacement, and offer additional services like car wash.
prompt_en: Is your car making a squeaking noise when stopping? It might be worn brake pads. Would you like to replace them and do an oil change and spark plug replacement? We can also wash your car after repairs.
prompt_zh: 您的車在停車時有吱吱聲嗎？可能是剎車片磨損。您想更換剎車片並做換油和火花塞更換嗎？修理後我們還可以幫您洗車。
sample_questions: What causes the squeaking noise when I stop?
Can you replace my brake pads today?
Do I need an oil change as well?
How long will the repairs take?
Is a car wash included after the service?

title: Ordering a Wedding Cake
desc: Assist customers in ordering a wedding cake by discussing guest count, flavor preferences, icing type, cake design, and offering cake samples.
prompt_en: Are you ordering a wedding cake? How many guests are you expecting? What flavors do you prefer? Would you like to sample chocolate and vanilla cakes? What design do you have in mind?
prompt_zh: 您在訂購婚禮蛋糕嗎？預計多少賓客？您喜歡什麼口味？想試吃巧克力和香草蛋糕嗎？您有什麼設計想法？
sample_questions: Can we have multiple layers with different flavors?
Is buttercream icing available?
Do you have cake samples to try?
Can you make a cake with roses and pearls design?
When is the wedding date?
